column6: It's covered your car, it's smothered your house...and now it's crawling through the door after you! It's THE CREEPING DOOM, and the PLANTMAN is using it to end the domination of animals over the Earth, and only Iron Man can stop him in time!
column8: | penciller:Ronan Cliquet | penciller (cover):Michael Golden | colorist:Marte Gracia | inker:Scott Koblish | letterer:Nate Piekos | writer:Fred Van Lente
